name: SimpleWiFi
description: This is an Arduino library for interfacing with WiFi modules that using AT command interface, such as ESP8266/ESP32. This library is based on the works of TinyGSM but stripped out all the supports of unrelated non-WiFi modules to make the library easier to setup and focus on the development of new features and functionalities related to WiFi modules.
keywords: AT commands, AT, ESP8266, Digi XBee WiFi
